title: CBM.01.Guitar Junior

Charly Blues Masterworks Vol. 1. - Guitar Junior: The Crawl (1993)
Blues | Mp3 256 Kbps | 74,06MB

Lonnie Brooks (born Lee Baker Jr., December 18, 1933) is an American blues singer and guitarist. He was born in Dubuisson, Louisiana.
